financial_benefits.description: Anguilla does not impose local income tax on foreign-sourced income for digital nomads.
The Eastern Caribbean Dollar (XCD) is the local currency, providing a stable financial environment.

lifestyle_benefits.description: Enjoy a tropical climate with warm temperatures year-round.
Anguilla offers a high quality of life with beautiful beaches and friendly locals.

additional_benefits.description: English is the official language, making communication easy for most expatriates.
Anguilla is known for its low crime rate and safe living conditions.

key_consideration: The Anguilla Digital Nomad Visa allows remote workers to stay for 3 to 12 months with no local tax on foreign income.
action_comment: Consider Anguilla for its unique opportunity to experience the Caribbean while working remotely.
tagline: Experience the Caribbean life in Anguilla.
tax_residency_trigger_details: You are considered a tax resident if you stay for longer than 183 days in a calendar year.

visas.key_consideration: Not extendable. A new application is required to continue staying on the island.

income_requirement.misc_details: Income proof required but no specific minimum stated.

application_fee.details: Fee covers up to 4 persons, including the applicant, spouse, and dependents. Additional dependents are charged $250 each.

visas.renewability_details: A new application is required after the visa expires.
visas.permanent_residency_details: Digital nomad visa does not lead to permanent residency.

special_regimes.name: Digital Nomad Visa
special_regimes.benefit: No income tax on foreign-sourced income.
eligibility: Proof of employment or self-employment that can be done remotely.
Valid police clearance from the past 6 months.

required_documents: Proof of Employment or Business Incorporation Certificate: income, employment, or self-employment certificate if you are a remote worker.
Valid police clearance: from the past 6 months for all applicants 18 years and older.
Proof of applicant’s relationship to dependents: such as marriage and birth certificates.
Pre-arranged transfer – to and from Anguilla.
Valid Health Insurance – this must-have COVID-19 coverage.
A brief description of the work the applicant is doing.
Proof of school enrollment for students.

visas.key_consideration: Long term visa options for stays exceeding one year.
